pullrequest.title: New parsing framework, drop the 2, parity basis

content.raw:
I agree with Daniel.  I would be happy to test out a few of our solvers on this problem and write it up.

I'll do an initial test with RK443 and confirm what CFL works, then let's do the larger timestepper study as a later PR within the next week or two (completely swamped this week and don't want to hold up the PR).

I think this is a good chance and a good problem to do a time-stepper convergence study on, which I've been interested in doing for a while.
content.html:
I agree with Daniel. I would be happy to test out a few of our solvers on this problem and write it up.

I'll do an initial test with RK443 and confirm what CFL works, then let's do the larger timestepper study as a later PR within the next week or two (completely swamped this week and don't want to hold up the PR).

I think this is a good chance and a good problem to do a time-stepper convergence study on, which I've been interested in doing for a while.
